titles.title: Blessing and Honor and Glory are Yours

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessing and Honor and Glory are Yours Both now and evermore.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thatâ€˜s why we praise You, praise You Let all the saints adore You Praise You, praise You For You are on the throne, Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not by might, Not by power, But by my Spirit says the Lord. (2x) This mountain shall be removed, This mountain shall be removed, This mountain shall be removed, By my Spirit says the Lord.{/lang-eng}
